name: Stick Panda Super Sports Challenge ALL STAR SPECIAL
name_original: Stick Panda Super Sports Challenge ALL STAR SPECIAL
description:
Development Time: 1 Week Overview:

Pandas, go wild!

Stick Panda Super Sports Challenge All-Star Special is a local multiplayer game for a maximum of 4 players to play together. Players can fight for themselves as individuals or team up to form a 2 against 2 fight. In this game, players will be given 3 random levels in a row and the ranking will be calculated based on the total scores from all the levels.

The player’s primary goal is to get to the level end checkpoint first to get the highest score in each level. During the gameplay, players can use items, weapons and even grab other players to stop them from getting to the goal first. If you are playing in team mode, sacrificing one of the members to distract your opponents might be a good strategy to consider.

Goal: Be the first to get to the goal! Controls(keyboard):

KEYBOARD & MOUSE:

WASD: Moving the character (W for Jumping)

Left Mouse Button: Attack

Right Mouse Button: Aim/Grab/Release

Middle Mouse Button: Throw

CONTROLLER:

Left Joystick: Moving the character (Up for Jumping)

Gamepad Right Shoulder: Attack

Gamepad Left Trigger: Aim/Grab/Release

Gamepad Left Shoulder: Throw

Creators:
